tag.raw: Mennonite Board of Missions Mennonite Mission Network Voluntary Service Alberta Marlboro
tag.author: 52529054@N06

description._content:
Caption: 1965. Marlboro, Alberta. Operating the free-farmer is this Co-op member, who is one of the operators that keeps the machine going at a 24-hour pace. The tree farmers hauls the stacks of posts out of the bush up to the main campgrounds to be loaded on trucks and taken to the pulp mill some 20 miles away.

Citation: Mennonite Board of Missions. Photographs. Marlboro, Alberta Voluntary Service. 1963. IV-10-7.2 Box 1 Folder 20 Photo 17. Mennonite Church USA Archives - Goshen. Goshen, Indiana.
